name: repos_enable-automated-security-fixes
description: Enables automated security fixes for a repository. The authenticated user must have admin access to the repository. For more information, see "[Configuring automated security fixes](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-cloud@latest//articles/configuring-automated-security-fixes)".

owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.
